input.sentences: she was happy to open her presents .
she received just what she wanted for her birthday .
the kids all sat at the table to have a slice .
even the baby enjoyed the cake .
output.sentences: Today was my little girls Happy Birthday.
She received a lot of birthday gifts.
To top it off , we had the perfect cake.
I cut slices up, and we all sat and enjoyed it.
I know my baby enjoyed her cake at her party.
